synopsis.text: Three high school friends, Minami, Ayaka, and Haruka, embark on a sun-soaked journey to the golf course, seeking relaxation and camaraderie. As a novice golfer, Minami finds her footing on the lush green course with the support and guidance of her experienced friends. Together, they share laughter, learning experiences, and a growing passion for the sport, turning a simple golf outing into a cherished memory and the start of a newfound hobby for Minami.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
